name: 4 Paws on Tony's Belly
description:
Cat George was sleeping in a raspberry forest, but suddenly Fox Luke woke him up to warn that monsters arrived in forest. Cat didn,t mind it and run straight home through dark places. At home is waiting Tom...Georges owner.

Controls:

  • Move: Left, Right
  • Jump/Doublejump/Walljump: Z
  • Shoot: X
  • Restart: R
  • Menu : Esc

Contact: michal.paluszek@wp.pl
